msItem.title: Scripture of the Perfected Taiji's Inquiries about Acts of Merit

note.p: "This intact roll preserves the text of a lateLingbaocodification offering a lesson on altruism. The scripture is framed as a dialogue between thePerfected Taiji(Taiji zhenren) andLaozi. Nine levels of activities are given whereby one may realize the merit of benefitting others. As112observes, this work is not extant in theMing Daoist Canon of 1445but a similar title is recorded in a catalogue of missing scriptures,HY 1419 'Dao zang que jing mu lu'. [JB]"
